title: Advise on Record-Keeping for Schedule C
description: A new freelancer asks for advice on what records they need to keep for their business expenses.

tasks.description: Identify the client's type of business (freelance writing).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the nature of the client's business.

tasks.description: Provide a list of common deductible expenses for their industry (e.g., home office, internet, software, supplies).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives a relevant list of potential deductions.

tasks.description: Explain the documentation requirements for each type of expense (e.g., receipts, logs, bank statements).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear and actionable advice on how to properly document expenses to withstand an audit.
